content: type='text' text='Virat Kohli is an Indian cricketer and one of the most prominent figures in international cricket. Born on November 5, 1988, in Delhi, India, he is a right-handed batsman known for his aggressive playing style and consistency. Kohli has served as the captain of the Indian national team in all formats and has numerous records to his name, including multiple accolades for being one of the leading run-scorers in international cricket. Off the field, he is also known for his significant influence in endorsements and his philanthropic work.' annotations=None
